event.title: appeared in Meigs County Court Friday

data.event: Garnes appeared in Meigs County Court Friday and is being held on $50,000 bond.

event.title: was found inside her home Feb. 26

data.event: Williams is accused of killing Doris Jackson, whose strangled body was found inside her home Feb. 26.
Local police recovered her stolen 1989 Mercury Marquis in Athens two days later.
